doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia

One of, if not the earliest house in County--Aspen Grove--Campbells--Porch Room similar to Ash Lawn, High Meadows, Temple Hill, & Wakefield--Darsie, Power, Nelson, Clark, Brand, Campbell, Sampson, Bolling family homes

1 Story Frame, 3 Bay, Hall-Parlor, Flemish Bond, 3 Course American Bond, Chimney Pent, 2 Ramp Chimney, Overmantel, Roman Numerals, Dormer Storage, Special Portrait Trim, Cut Nails, Rose Head Nails, Wood Wainscots, Punkah, Summer Beam, Sawn Lath, Split Rivens, Marbleizing, Winder Stair, Porch Room, 2 Front Doors, 6 Panel Doors, 4 Panel Doors, Barred Cellar Windows, 2/2, 4/4, 6/6, Winter Kitchen with Oven, Ash House, Wood Shed, Well House, Corncrib, Barn, Kitchen, Smokehouse, 2 Cemeteries
